meanings.definition: Cooked in a sauce made with its own juices
meanings.sent1: The fricasseed chicken was flavorful and tender.
meanings.sent2: The chef served a delicious fricasseed dish at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The fricasseed vegetables danced in the savory sauce.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the fricasseed stew filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The fricasseed meat melted in my mouth with each bite.

meanings.definition: To prepare (food) by cutting into small pieces and cooking in a sauce
meanings.sent1: She fricasseed the beef for tonight's dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chef will fricasseed the seafood for the special menu.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally fricasseed the ingredients for the soup.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of fricasseed onions filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully fricasseed the chicken to perfection.
